General.Name: Hainan Expressway Co Ltd
General.Description: Hainan Expressway Co., Ltd. engages in expressways business in China. It is also involved in the transportation infrastructure construction; real estate development; hotel and tourism; and investment and operation of sports tourism and construction business. In addition, the company engages in the finance, land development, and advertising businesses. Hainan Expressway Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Haikou, China.
